successes.title: Sails of Glory - Miniatures Ship Combat
successes.description: Sails of Glory is an "Age of Sail" tactical ship-to-ship miniature game, inspired by the best-selling Wings of Glory system.

Pledges.description: Supporter - Thank you! We appreciate your effort in supporting our project with your donation. A list of all our supporters will be posted on the Ares Games web site.
British Gunner - you will receive two Kickstarter-Exclusive British Ship Packs, the HMS Juno 1780 Frigate and HMS Bellerophon 1786 Ship of the Line.
French Gunner - you will receive the two Kickstarter-Exclusive French Ship Packs, the Concorde 1777 Frigate and Fougueux 1785 Ship of the Line.

Marine - you will receive all four Kickstarter-Exclusive Ship Packs: The British HMS Juno 1780 Frigate and HMS Bellerophon 1786 Ship of the Line; and the French Concorde 1777 Frigate and Fougueux 1785 Ship of the Line.
(Early Bird) Mate - you will receive one copy of the Sails of Glory Starter Set. Includes shipping to any US address.
Mate - you will receive one copy of the Sails of Glory Starter Set. Includes shipping to any US address.
(Eary Bird) Lieutenant - you will receive one copy of the Sails of Glory Starter Set, plus the four Kickstarter-Exclusive Ship Packs. Includes shipping to any continental US address.
Lieutenant - you will receive one copy of the Sails of Glory Starter Set, plus the four Kickstarter-Exclusive Ship Packs. Includes shipping to any US address.

Worldwide Lieutenant - you will receive the rewards of the Lieutenant level (one copy of the Sails of Glory Starter Set, plus the four Kickstarter-Exclusive Ship Packs, plus all the applicable stretch goals)   --- PLUS options of your choice up to a total value of $ 40, freely chosen between those scheduled to ship in August 2013. Includes shipping to any address in the World.

(Early Bird) Captain - you will receive the rewards of the Lieutenant level, plus one copy of each of the 8 Ship Packs of the first wave - 4 British and 4 French ships. Includes shipping to any continental US address.
Captain - you will receive the rewards of the Lieutenant level, plus one copy of each of the 8 Ship Packs of the first wave - 4 British and 4 French ships.  Includes shipping to any US address.

Worldwide Captain - you will receive the rewards of the Captain level (one copy of the Sails of Glory Starter Set, plus the four Kickstarter-Exclusive Ship Packs, plus one copy of each of the 8 Ship Packs of the first wave, plus all the applicable stretch goals)  --- PLUS options of your choice up to a total value of $ 40, freely chosen between those scheduled to ship in August 2013. Includes shipping to any address in the World.

(Early Bird) Commodore - you will receive two times the rewards of the Captain level: 2 copies of the Sails of Glory Starter Set, 2 copies of each of the 4 Kickstarter-Exclusive Ship Packs, 2 copies of each of the 8 Ship Packs of the first wave - 4 British and 4 French ships. You will receive 2 each of the additional stretch goal rewards of the Captain level.
Includes shipping to any continental US address.
Canadian backers, add $ 30 for shipping charges instead than $ 60.

Commodore - you will receive two times the rewards of the Captain level: 2 copies of the Sails of Glory Starter Set, 2 copies of each of the 4 Kickstarter-Exclusive Ship Packs, 2 copies of each of the 8 Ship Packs of the first wave - 4 British and 4 French ships. You will receive 2 each of the additional stretch goal rewards of the Captain level.
Includes shipping to any continental US address.
Canadian backers, add $ 30 for shipping charges instead than $ 60.

Admiral of the Fleet (Retailers only) - you will receive 3 copies of the Sails of Glory Starter Set, 3 copies of each of the 4 Kickstarter-Exclusive Ship Packs, plus 3 copies of each of the 8 Ship Packs of the first wave - 4 British and 4 French ships. Includes shipping to any continental US address. You must provide credentials to show that you operate a retail store.

Worldwide Commodore- you will receive two times the rewards of the Captain level (2 copies of the Sails of Glory Starter Set, 2 copies of each of the 4 Kickstarter-Exclusive Ship Packs, 2 copies of each of the 8 Ship Packs of the first wave, plus two each of the additional stretch goal rewards of the Captain level) --- plus options of your choice up to a total value of $ 80, freely chosen between those scheduled to ship in August 2013. Includes shipping to any address in the World.
